title: Need Friends ♡
body: Want to play with people who uses discord/skype. Haven't played much league and want to get back to into it :>

replies.body: Heyo im an adc main. im keen to play with peeps im looking for new peeps to play with! add me on league and i look forward to playing
heya man looking for a adc main so i can support ima add you my IGN - knevets
Add my twin Lunä she's always looking for people to play with she just hit lvl 30 so she's still learning and doesn't have slot of runes yet
Add me, but no Skype or Discord.
https://discord.gg/8jKcHvR join this discord its got tons of people who would be willing to play with you
